God of WisdomUpdated on 11 Jul 2019With a budget of $100/mth, it would not be cost effective to do stocks. You may consider building up your portfolio with some dividend paying unit trusts. You can do this on POEMS. Start with one fund first and you can switch out into other funds once your portfolio grows in size.6 comments6

We compared the different RSP (DBS vs OCBC vs PhillipCapital).
